explanation: I have carefully considered the input from my teammates, and I believe the First-aid kit is the most crucial item for our survival in the harsh Atacama Desert environment. Prioritizing our health and well-being by having a well-equipped First-aid kit increases our chances of staying healthy and resilient until we can find help.
